Package IOT.IOTApplication.alarmclock

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ACRestService
    AlarmClockRESTService - This class offers an API to the user to get all available alarms or one specific alarm, create a new one and delete a previously created one through a REST Client.
    Alarm  
    AlarmClockGUI
    Servlet implementation of GUI for alarm clock application
    AlarmClockService
    The AlarmClockService creates and saves alarms set by the user.
    PiezoPlayer
    Plays tunes on a Piezo that is connected to the Raspberry Pi that this application is running on.
